postUrls.title: Instagram Post URLs
postUrls.description: List of Instagram post or reel URLs to analyze for leads

sessionId.title: Instagram sessionId
sessionId.description: Instagram sessionid cookie for authenticated scraping.

debugComments.title: Debug Comments
debugComments.description: When enabled, pushes raw comment records to the dataset for debugging.

maxCommentsPerPost.title: Max Comments Per Post
maxCommentsPerPost.description: Maximum number of comments to retrieve from each post. Higher values increase processing time and cost.

targetLeads.title: Target Number of Leads
targetLeads.description: Target number of qualified leads to extract. Processing stops early when target is reached to save costs.

minLeadScore.title: Minimum Lead Score
minLeadScore.description: Minimum lead quality score (0.0 to 1.0) required to include in results. Recommended: 0.4 for broad capture, 0.6+ for high quality only.
